com.google.android.exoplayer.util

Class PlayerControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.util.PlayerControl

  • public class PlayerControl
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of MediaPlayerControl for controlling an ExoPlayer instance.

    This class is provided for convenience, however it is expected that most applications will implement their own player controls and therefore not require this class.

      • getAudioSessionId

        public int getAudioSessionId()
        This is an unsupported operation.

        Application of audio effects is dependent on the audio renderer used. When using MediaCodecAudioTrackRenderer, the recommended approach is to extend the class and override MediaCodecAudioTrackRenderer.onAudioSessionId(int).

        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Always thrown.
